content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_block
inventory=[{"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 61, "index": 25}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 60, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 56, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft an iron_block, I need to place 9 iron_ingots in a 3x3 grid. I will start by moving one of the iron_ingots from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_block
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 61, "index": 25}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 60, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 56, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 38}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}]
thought: Next, I need to move another iron_ingot to the right of the first one, so I will move it from slot 38 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1
